CustomField.description: This is a unique identifier for an Account. This field will be used in the creation of a Sales Order from a Quote to determine if the Quote came in from a known Customer. This Id may be assigned in a foreign system - especially if the RFQ came from that foreign system
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a unique Id for this Account. If RFQs are retrieved from a foreign system, use the value for the site that the foreign system assigns.
CustomField.label: Customer Site Id
